name: OrbitOne
description:
OrbitOne is a cute little Puzzle Game. You control a fish and have to save the Universe.

A physics simulation of the law of universal gravitation in a cartoonish setting.  

I worked on the game only for one day.

This game was created for the GameJam GMTK https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019. 

(Only 4 levels for now. In developement.)
